plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange, but I have a green leafy top!
🐇 Rabbits love to munch on me.
🌱 I grow under the ground.

plant.question: I have a trunk and many leaves. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am very tall and strong.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.

plant.question: I am small and green and cover the ground. Sometimes you can walk on me with bare feet. What am I?

hints.text: 💚 I am soft and springy.
⚽ You can play games on me.
💧 I need water to stay green.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I come in many different shapes and colors.
🌻 You can give me as a gift.
🐝 I need sunshine to grow.

plant.question: I grow on a vine and I am purple or green. You can eat me as a snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🥤You can make juice from me.
🌞 I like warm weather.

plant.question: I have a hard brown shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels like to hide me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I can be cracked open.
🐿️ Squirrels bury me for winter.
🍂 I fall from the tree in autumn.

plant.question: I am long and green. I grow on a farm. You can make pickles out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am crunchy and juicy.
🥗 You can put me in a salad.
🏡 Farmers plant me in rows.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with yellow kernels. You can pop me to make a yummy snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow in a big field.
🍿 You can eat me at the movies.
🔥 I need heat to pop.

plant.question: I am a plant with sharp needles and cones. People decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I stay green all year long.
⭐ People put a star on top of me.
🎁 Presents are put under me.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful flowers. I am often given as a sign of love. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 My flowers can be many colors, like red, pink, or yellow.
🌹 People give me to show they care.
🖐️ Be careful of my sharp thorns.

cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky. I'm big and round and give light to the Earth during the night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm just a sliver.
🐺 Werewolves like me!
🧀 People sometimes say I'm made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I'm a big ball of fire way up high. I give you light and keep you warm. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 You can't look directly at me!
🌻 Flowers turn to face me.
☀️ I rise in the East and set in the West.

cosmos.question: I twinkle at night and am far away from Earth. Many of us grouped together create pictures if you connect the dots! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I'm very sparkly.
🔦 You can wish upon me.
🌌 I am part of a constellation.

cosmos.question: I am a big, round place where you live. I have land and water, and I spin around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I am also called a planet.
🌱 Plants and animals live here.
💙 I'm mostly blue from space.

cosmos.question: I'm a group of many stars that make a shape in the sky. People long ago made up stories about me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Ursa Major is one example.
🔗 I'm made by connecting the dots of stars.
📜 Ancient people used me to tell stories.

cosmos.question: I'm a place far away where there are many stars, planets, and dust. I am really really big, and our sun lives in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I have a spiral shape.
🌌 Our solar system is inside me.
🥛 The Milky Way is an example.

cosmos.question: I'm a rocky thing that flies around the Sun, but I'm much smaller than a planet. I live in a belt with many others. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 Some have hit the Earth in the past!
☄️ I can be found between Mars and Jupiter.
🪨 I'm made of rock and metal.

cosmos.question: I'm a ball of ice and dust that flies through space. When I get close to the Sun, I get a long, bright tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am mostly frozen.
☄️ I leave a bright streak in the sky.
💫 I am a 'dirty snowball'.

cosmos.question: I am the force that keeps your feet on the ground and keeps all the planets orbiting the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree explains me.
⬇️ What goes up, must come down because of me.
💪 I am a force of attraction.

cosmos.question: I am what everything is made of. Planets, stars, even you! I take up space and have weight. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 A rock is made of me.
💨 I can be a solid, a liquid, or a gas.
🧪 Everything you can touch is made of me.
